data.title: SMC-SEC FORM 17A 04 16 2021 Part 1 - FINAL
data.meta_description: SMC-SEC_FORM_17A_04_16_2021_Part_1_-FINAL - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or view presentation slides online. This document provides an overview of San Miguel Corporation (SMC) as one of the largest and most diversified conglomerates in the Philippines. SMC owns market-leading businesses in food and beverage, packaging, energy, fuel and oil, infrastructure, cement, property and banking services. It has 45,522 employees and over 100 production facilities across Asia-Pacific. Major products include beer, spirits, non-alcoholic beverages, poultry, animal feeds, flour, meats, dairy, coffee, packaging, petroleum, and cement. SMC has strategic partnerships with international companies for expertise and technologies. It discusses its various business segments and refers to annexes for further details on financial performance and investments
